channel.title: [pi webclient] lets brain-storm [pi webclient]
channel.description:
MSN: gsempire@live.com
PROBLEM: Webclient skips loading the cache for some people but works for others.
QUESTION: Is the cache downloading my problem? I have it hosted on fileden or somewhere with a direct download link.
Please add my on msn and help me brainstorm and or create another webclient.

item.title: [pi webclient] lets brain-storm [pi webclient]
item.dc:creator: @Gsempire Gsempire
item.description:
@Gsempire wrote:

Grants-Empire-Cache-V1, i dont think thats popular, but thanks alot for you post!

Read full topic

item.title: [pi webclient] lets brain-storm [pi webclient]
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“Gsempire, post:1, topic:381252”]MSN: gsempire@live.com

PROBLEM: Webclient skips loading the cache for some people but works for others.

QUESTION: Is the cache downloading my problem? I have it hosted on fileden or somewhere with a direct download link.

Please add my on msn and help me brainstorm and or create another webclient.[/quote]
I would think that its the cache name you are using, maybe its a popular name that many servers use that can interupt with the cache downloading.
